data.name: Gravity Lab
data.description:
Gravity Lab is a physics and electronics puzzle game that will keep you busy figuring out solutions and exploring an abandoned moon base.

Now includes the "Microstar", "Time Travel" and "Passthrough" content updates.

"I have lost hours to Gravity Lab. The VR immersion is almost secondary to the mental immersion in eking out the best solutions to the problems" - Road To VR

Features:
- 55 mind bending puzzles, with 3 variations each
- Integrated level editor and workshop for community created levels
- Multiple locomotion and comfort options including teleport, joystick locomotion and miniature mode for seated play
- Cloud Sync and Leaderboards
- Passthrough Mode

Please be aware that strong gravitational forces can cause a looming feeling of being observed! Never look directly at the emitted particles! All damages to the time and space continuum and all involved repair costs will be passed on to you!

-- Gravity Lab Management

changelog.change_log:
1.220
Added UI translation
Added back Vignetting
Fixed readability of buttons in the level editor keyboard

The Micro Star Update - v1.14.0

- Added 6 new Micro Star Levels
- Changed Gravity Modifier Logic. Now using the same modifier effect on an item toggles the effect
- Improved visuals in Micro Star environment
- Bugfix for level editor not displaying own custom levels in some circumstances

October Update 1.12.0
- Graphical Improvements for Quest 2

September Update 1.11.0
- New button activation mechanic
- New free locomotion mode
- Improved font rendering
- Support for custom radio stations
- Added area to practice throwing/deleting items in reception
- Fixed hand animation
- Potential fix for game freezing due to low memory
- New glass shader
- Minor bug fixes

Follow the game's updates and roadmap at http://gravitylab-game.com/roadmap
